name: L.U.R.K.E.R.
description:
A roguelike inspired by S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and Escape from Tarkov.

Kill everything and collect enough supplies to stay alive as long as you can in the "abandoned" bunkers under the special exclusion zone.

Features:

  • Different level archetypes (bunker, labs, etc)
  • Melee and Ranged combat
  • Variety of weapons, armor and items to find
  • Myriad monsters to murder
  • Guns require compatible ammo (9x18mm, 12g, 5.45x45mm, etc)
  • Level up by killing everything
  • Upgrade your stats to become unstoppable
  • Post-mortem file generated upon death

Music by Ethan Hamman
